values: [this journal is closed if you want the mbp emma go to : ]

Bloody hell, I'm sorry for my absence!  Things have been really busy for me and I haven't had the time to sit down, even.  

I'm thinking about you all, especially Rupert.  Valentine's Day was magnificent, and I'm glad I got to share it with someone as special to me as you are.  I love you with all my heart.

I've got to get going, but I might be online soon.  Talk to you all later.



-Emma

Which LOTR character (male) would you end up with? by Cormak
Username:
You end up with:Legolas
You meet on:September 25, 3018
This is where:in the forest of Mirkwood
And this is what happens:He makes love to you beneath the stars

 O.o

Valentine's Day is coming up and I have no earthly idea what to get Rupert. I'm thinking candy, of course, but I'm also thinking a nice watch would do. *cry* I am so bloody confused. Maybe just spending Valentine's Day weekend away from everybody would be wonderful. I just need to figure out what to do before Valentine's Day comes up and I'm stuck still figuring out what to purchase. I got my room all clean and it doesn't smell like cat crap anymore. I should really think before putting my cat's litter in my bathroom. I think I should put them downstairs or something. We're going to begin on Goblet of Fire really soon. We've had a whole hell of a lot of kids going up for roles and a whole lot of Bulgarians for the role of Krum. I'm not sure how many, like almost 200 or so? I hope he's at least cute or something, or I'd have to worry about Hermione's taste in boys. I sure hope I don't have to kiss him.
someone buy me a new username

I was having a bad day yesterday.  My cat Bubbles scratched up my favourite pink plush pillow, my mum forgot to empty out the cat littler while I was gone so my room stunk, I stepped in a puddle of water and my shoe got all wet as well as my sock and I hate wet socks, I slipped on the front porch and about broke my ankle and my arm hurt so much from lifting so much heavy shit in my room.  

On a good note, I'm feeling much better now, and I want my boyfriend!  I'm going to snag Rupert and go off somewhere this weekend. It's Friday and I have to get away from this house for just a little while.  My Mum's driving me insane and Alex's schoolmates keep calling me Hermione.

The life I live.

i'm going to make this short and sweet

my arm is killing me, i need asprin, i want to smack someone, good bye
is it me or is livejournal being a total fuck up today

I absolutely can't belive Rupert made an icon of us getting slimed!  It was the most gross--fun--thing I've ever done in my entire life!! Rupert sure enjoyed it though, after we were leaving, he kept shaking on me like a wet dog does after you bathe it.  Not that I wasn't slimed enough, he just had to add more.  

I'm not getting this whole American football thingy but during that halftime show, everybody's all freaked out because Justin stripped Janet and to be frank, I'm getting tired of hearing about it everywhere I go.  Just leave it alone!  That's why I hate paparazzi and gossip bull, once something 'extreme' like that happens, they don't know when to stop talking about it.  Like that kiss bewteen Madonna and Britney.  That happened like what...a few months ago and people are still talking about it?  I'm also sick of hearing crap being said about <lj user="jackson_michael"> as well, every time I turn on the telly, they've found out something new about the whole damn case and on every damn channel they are talking about it.  I'm sorry but I have a very low tolerance about crap like that.  It's just one of my major pet peeves.  

Anyways, I've done some icons for Michael and Anna so far, but I'm not finished yet.  I'll post them as soon as I'm finished finding some good pictures.

<strike>I couldn't pass it up, so I went to the states with Rupert for the Nickelodeon takes over the Superbowl thingy.  It's been fun hanging out with my wifey!!</strike>  Rupert and I brodcasted from England for Nickelodeon takes over the superbowl thingy.  I got slimed and I'm still a little messy--must shower--but I'm having a blast.  Good thing my Mum let me take the laptop or I wouldn't be able to update.  

I've gotta go though, Rupert and I are headed to the hotel room, I've definately gotta get a shower!

-Emma


Edit: <small>[alright so emma and rupert weren't in the states, but in england, skip over that, I didn't see it myself *smacks self---oww* so I quickly updated....but yeah...moving on...]</small>

The flu has turned down to just a bit of a stomach ache every now and then.  I'm back on my feet but until I get better, I can't go anywhere, I am stuck.

I am back to my icon crazy ways again <lj user="jackson_michael"> you should be getting some soon, and whoever else wants some, comment becuase I'm so damn bored.


I miss Rupert.  I need to make icons to take my mind off of him, because I'm not sure if he's coming back or not *sigh*

I'm still here *hack*  I stole my Mum's laptop so I can update.  looks like <lj user="dan__radcliffe"> is back.  yay, i can torture him more and rupert's gone missing.  i hope he returns, tom is scaring me.

that is all, must sleep

I've got a huge ass headache and the room's like starting to swirl, so I'll make this a quickie. 

I believe I've got the flu.  Yeah, go me!  Alex had one of his little friends over who was sick before, so naturally, him being around me a lot, I caught it, so I'm barfing like crazy and the first sight or sent of food sends me to the toilet.  Sorry so graphic, but eh, life sucks.  

I cancelled whatever I had planned for today and I'm going to sleep.  Sorry Rupert love, but you'll have to deal with Daniel, Tom, and Devon on your own.  

Love all of you but I gotta go, the room's starting to spin again.
Everybody, <strike>my worst nightmare has come true</strike> my brother Alex is here.  Go say hi <lj user="alex_watson">

I went to lunch with Mum and Alex today.  Mum took us shopping and I bought a lot of new clothes.  Now I'm all prepped up when I have to go back to school.  Blech.  Totally not looking forward it. 

Daniel deleted his journal.  Little prat.  I knew he wouldn't be able to keep it too long, maybe another one will show up that will actually stay.  I'm actually getting kinda worried about Rupert as well, and Tom.  They're all slowly fading away...*sniff* At least I still got Devon :-* ...I hope.

I am bloody tired.  We've been doing interviews up the hizzy today.  I've been eternally busy.  I was searching the web and I found this: wwww.emma-rupert.com
Wow, Rupert and I have our own website together! How bloody cute. 

Where the hell is everybody?  Dan and Tom seemed to have dissapeared and I don't want to know what they're doing...Hannah seemed to give Sean back but he's gone missing too, Devon's still around, and my Rupert has gone missing.  When I return to update more, everyone's just like, dissappeared!  If I dissappeared again, maybe they'll return :-p

I can't seem to find any new bloody pictures of myself lately.  I found a few but that's it.  Once POA is out, I believe I'll have more on the internet, I hope. 

I'm still bored, if anyone else needs icons, let me know. 

-Emma

Finally! The day all Orlando Bloom girlfans have been waiting for, (okay maybe just me SORRY RUPERT I STILL LOVE YOU) I know Rupert's gonna hate me for this (he already hates all the pictures of Orli I have in my trailor but he doesn't complain, he knows I have girlfan syndrome. Here they are : It's all I have so far, if you don't want to use them, it's okay! But here you are anyways! <3, Emma

I've been going icon crazy! First Orlando then Lalaine. If anyone else wants any, just let me know and I'll be sure to find some pictures. I was just going to put up Lalaine's icons but now since the confusion of and so I have no clue who to give them to! But here they are nonetheless:

I'm sorry I haven't been able to get back on aim, my internet was being screwy and doing things like 'page cannot be displayed' so I couldn't get to aim express which sucks even more because now it's too late. 

Tomorrow I will have to put Orli's icons in my update.  It's your choice to use them or not, Orli and if you don't, us Orli girlfans (and Jerry) will have something to drool over.

I've got to be going, I'll talk to you tomorrow or something Lalaine because I've given up trying to sign onto aim and it's bedtime soon. 


Love you all! :-* 

  Emma Charlotte Duerre Watson

Oh Lord, I was flipping through the channels and if you all have HBO, Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone is on right now. Oh dear, I haven't seen this movie in ages and I'm so tiny! So was everyone else, Tom sounds squeaky *snort*

I'm still here and I'm here to stay!  Yes, I'll be around more often, but sadly not during the night times because that's when [this computer] is shut down.  So yes, I'm perfecting my sleeping pattern, which is all screwy since we stopped filming.

Anywho, I hope to spend the remaining weekend with Rupert.  We've been so busy promoting POA that we've been giving some time off.  So yay, time with my boyfriend!  

I gotta go.  I don't have much to say because nothing lately has been happening but...


<big> I DECLAIRE SPAM WAR </big>

Hello there it's your favorite Harry Potter star here screw everybody else no one likes Harry or Ron or Draco anymore, it's all about Hermione! Yes Hermione 24 hours a day 7 days a week!  They're taking everybody off, it'll be the 'Wickedly Awesome Adventures of Hermione Granger' now instead of just plain boring 'Harry Potter'. Witness movie one, Hermione studying for the exams! Movie two....Hermione does some homework and studies some more! They already kicked Sean out of the bloody movie might as well kick everybody else out too!!

Just kidding, I love everybody!  :-* 

No more chocolate for me this late at night...

HAPPY FREAKING NEW YEAR! 

I had a good one, I spent it with Rupert of course.  Our midnight kiss lasted well longer than midnight O:-) 

I'm off to Scotland soon to spend some time with Sean and Christian.  Hopefully I can drag Rupert with me.  I have to go soon because then we'll be promoting for POA and I will have absolutely NO time! 

Love you all! oh and welcome Mr. <lj user="jackson_michael"> he is the best! 

-Emma

hehehehe
My LiveJournal 12 Days
My True Love gave to me...
12 bif_nakeds a-stomping.
11 bonnie_ws a-smooching.
10 britney_spearss a-giggling.
9 christian_cs a-breakdancing.
8 deb_gibsons a-twisting.
7 dradcliffes a-dancing.
6 felton_s a-tripping.
5 golden hard_rocs.
4 staring j_l_spearss.
3 Sicilian mr_biggerstaffs.
2 puppy rupert__grints.
And a sean_astin in a pomelo tree.
Get gifts! Username:
Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.
stolen randomly lol *snort*

<center><big> HAPPY CHRISTMAS </center></big>


Sorry I'm not all flashy and I can't do the big colours because all the computer knowledge in my head went kapoot since my computer bit the big one, so yeah, Happy Christmas everybody, I'll be headed to Rupert's house soon....again!  Mum wouldn't let me spend the week I wanted so Christmas Eve I went over there and spent a few hours and then we're going back over today...my mum's just got to phone up Rupert's Mum.

I've got some presents for everybody, you'll just have to wait for them, I'm not going to list them now because I've got a bloody headache and I've got to go to bed, I'm damn tired. 

Love you Rupert again, Happy Christmas everyone!

Bloody fucking hell, aim express is pissing me off, so I'm forgetting about it, arghh.  

Anyways, went shopping today.  With my Dad and Alex.  I'm just about finished with my Christmas shopping, so far I've bought for Rupert, Tom, Dan, Jamie Lynn, Sean, Christian, the rest of our castmates including the adults, Devon, Matthew, Bonnie, *phew* and I still have more to buy for.  I still have to get something for my parents and Alex, and each a present for my two cats, Bubbles and Domino.  I'm thinking rhinestone collars in two different colours, what do you think?  Bubbles would look beautiful in a rhinestone collar, Domino's kinda shaky with his bell collar he's got on now, it's funny, he doesn't know where the noise is coming from and the reason I keep it on him is for pure entertainment ;) hahaha.

It's boring at home with no computer.  Just fishing around for new pictures on this one to make icons with is boring.  It's quiet.  Just a small vacation at home is grand, then it's promoting promoting promoting and spending a year more with Dan, Rupert and Tom.  Rupert loves it.  Spending time with me gets him all smilie and (I would say giggly but he'd hurt me haha) happy.  

So I asked my Mum if it was alright if I could spend a holiday with Sean and Christian.  She said it was alright after New Year's because we're going to the mountians for Christmas and get a cabin.  We're suppost to spend Christmas Eve with Dad to open presents from him.
   

Anyways, that's my update for today, I have to leave for the weekend and go to my Mum's house.  Blahhhh.  Here's my bloody schedule: mon, tue, wed, half of thursday is with mum, the rest of thursday, friday, saturday, and sunday is with Dad, and then we go back to Mum.  It's screwy.  Divorces suck. 

I think I'm going to spend a week of Christmas break with Rupert and return home the day before Christmas Eve then after Christmas it's off to Scotland to see Sean and Christian.  I have to keep some of my schedule open just in case Nick wants to drop by.  I hope he doesn't mind spending time with a thirteen year old :D  I can be quite entertaining.


Okay and I'm rambling.  Have to get going, Dad's going to take us to Mum's house soon, so ta-ta.



-Emma Charlotte Duerre Watson

<lj-cut text="ooc">


[Alright, since aim was being bitchy, I've decided to take a bit of a break from Emma after I leave for the weekend. Just to know that I don't have to worry about her being taken over by someone else.  If a mbp person would tell me that it's okay, I'd sure appreciate it (like johnny rzeznik person cough cough) 

I'm not sure when my computer at home will be fixed...we just may end up buying a newer one, who knows.  

I just really want to know if I don't have to have heartattacks whenever I have to go back home and worry about Emma being taken over.  

*puppy pout* 

if any mbp person would like to email me about this or something, my email is : 

untilitsleepsx@yahoo.com

thank you]

Sorry Rupert dear, my aim express went all screwy when you imed me, I'll be right back alright? Love you bunches!

-Emma


Edit:  It's still screwing up on me, we'll just have to comment to eachother, bahh.  The computer I'm using doesn't have AIM, so sorry love :(

I've just been searching the web for some photos of me, the newest ones, thank you.  Anyways, I've found quite a bit but you'll have to excuse some of my icons, they're not as sharp imaged as my old ones were.  The computer I'm on is kinda screwy and I'm not used to it very much.  

Anyways, so here's the new icons, I sure hope you'll like them but no staring too hard, Rupert won't like it ;)

Hello I am back, I know most of you have missed me bundles, but I'm here, for now at least.  Nothing's down in the home front (yes I am white and I am British, that doesn't sound right coming out of my mouth, shut up Tom) 

I saw the films Pirates of the Carribean and Santa Clause 2 today.  Fine films they are, sorry Johnny I didn't see POTC sooner, I was so busy filming myself I couldn't see it when it came out, but it was a bloody damn good movie it was.  

Anyways, I'll be off, I'll be online sometime later, so whoever's on, IM ME so I won't be bored, k.

Luv you all, 

Emma

Boy, I'm a little bored.  I just signed on and no one imed me, so I signed off.  There was barely anyone on anyways, if someone changed their sn and I didn't know about it, you should comment here and tell me how much you absolutely NEED me online. :-P


Anyways, I've been so bored since filming wrapped up.  I've been getting good feedback from the trailor of PoA, so they like it so far.  I think it's going to be much better than the first two but that's just my opinion.  

That's all I have to write now, I don't have a big update except I have to say this one thing:

                    <center> Tom Felton has smelly feet.</center>



*bows* 
There ya go.

Filming closed today. I am taking a quick break from packing everything up. Mum comes to pick me up today at one. Bonnie and Matthew are already gone, as well as most of the adults.

I'm looking out the window of my trailer and watching as everyone runs back and forth carrying set pieces and costumes from set into storage. Its so sad to be done with everything. I don't know what I'm going to do with myself until February. How will I not see Dan, Tom, Rupert, Matthew and Bonnie everyday? It will seem unnatural.

 I don't want to go. **cries**

Oh, yes, happy 20th birthday, <lj user="c_rankin">

Well, last night was the party. I hope everyone who attended had an excellent time. I know I certainly did. For anyone else, I hope your Hallowe'en's were fun and filled with sweets.

I am currently sitting in my trailer watching Bonnie, Devon and Matthew eat candy as quickly as they can. We have to get rid of all of this candy before set closes on Saturday, so they've been having competitions all day. This afternoon Bonnie ate so much she was literally jumping around her trailer. 

 Rupert and I have been amusing ourselves by throwing candy into the air and watching as they scramble for it. They're like little dogs. heh. Dan and Tom have disappeared somewhere, but none of us are crazy to go look for them

byebye, luv you all. :-*

emma___watson goes trick-or-treating, dressed up as Draco Malfoy.
bonnie_w gives you 3 light yellow blueberry-flavoured jelly beans.

emma___watson ends up with 52 pieces of candy, a pen cap, a broken toy car, and a broken balloon.
Go trick-or-treating! Username:
Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.
a pen cap...how cheap are you, Chris?

So, its official. Bonnie and I are throwing a Hallowe'en party. Everyone who has ever been on set at a Harry Potter movie ever in their history of their careers or anyone who wants to pretend they have or anyone who happens to be in the area, is invited.

Yes, there will be candy. No, there will not be alcohol for anyone below the age of 17. Yes, you will all be attending. Yes, we decided to be original and use the theme Harry Potter. Yes, you will all be attending in your costumes.

Its gonna be fun. **goofy grin**

Love you all, but mostly Rupert. :-*

Ahh, I didn't get online as expected, but I'm leaving from my little computer vacation to go back to filming, it is sad but I will still keep on posting as I said earlier so you guys won't be left behind ;) 

I love you with all my heart my Rupert ! 

<3 Emma

I am so thankful right now to Bonnie!!!! She read how worried I was about all these clones popping up all over the place, so she actually lent me her laptop! This means, naturally, I'll be able to update on a more regular basis. I just want to say thanks to everyone for letting me keep my journal and not bugging me too much. I finally decided to give up on my mum and have ordered a new computer. How long it will take to get to set, I have no idea. Speaking of set, things here are going great. I'm a little worried about all these people who are coming in with invitations and then writing up their experiences and posting them on the web. That might sound rude, but come on! The major point about a premiere is that no one really knows what to expect. Can't the fans just trust us and wait until June? Though, come to think of it, the later release date probably has something to do with all of their snooping. Don't get me wrong, I love my fans- but honestly! Oh yes, I would like to make sure you all know that I had no plans to go to Mexico and have hot wild sex with Dan. I love my Rupert too much. Dan was just thinking wishfully. But, hey, its not my fault I'm better than Tom. ;) Hey, all right, here's the plan. No, I'm not the girl who plays Emma, but the girl who plays Bonnie. 'Emma' and I decided that I will take Emma until her computer gets fixed and she can take over full time. 'Emma' will still update from time to time and my main focus will always be Bonnie. So if Emma and Bonnie have a lot of co-existing story lines for a while, thats why. Also, if you have a serious story line with Emma, besides the obvious Rupert/Emma one, can you leave a comment and tell me about it, or your relationship with Emma. If you are looking for a story line with Emma, just email me at faking_bonnie@yahoo.com and I'll talk it over with her and we'll see what we can do! Bye!

Boy, I hope I haven't been replaced yet, I can rarely get to a computer, and I'm so afraid I might have to leave this place. My Mum is always holding off fixing my computer and I have to find a way to get to one, even going to my Dad's or my grandmum's house.  So, it's all too difficult. 

I'm not leaving just now, if I do, I'll have to find someone that's worthwhile, because I have been here for so long.

<lj-cut text="ooc again ...">

[if i can get someone to play emma who would give me my character back when I get my new computer (which should be sometime soon) I have a new email, it's untilitsleepsx@yahoo.com, so email me and we shall discuss arangements.  Just don't get too attatched to her, please? That is all I ask.  Maybe someone like 'Bonnie' can handle Emma and Bonnie at the same time haha, I know she'd give me Emma back....but enough of my ramblings, send me emails and we'll talk, just no one make another emma journal]

Holy shit, I hope you haven't replaced me yet, if you did I'll cry.  I'll cry so hard I'll...I'll.....okay I think I'm still save. 

Well things on the home front aren't still fixed.  Mum's taking the computer to a friend who can fix it real well, so hopefully I'll be up and running soon. 

Anyways, filming's going great, we're almost finished, so yeah hopefully you'll get to see the finished product and like it.  

I have to be going, I might be online sometime soon, so yeah.  Be looking out for me. 


<lj-cut text="ooc">

[please guys, please save emma for me, i'd be devistated if I lost her, because it'd be awful, i've worked so hard for her and I've had her forever and I've made so many friends through her and yeah, this is my plead.

my computer should be fixed sometime soon, so hold everything and i'll be online soon!

-me]

A more meaningful update now, I guess. 

     Yesterday I was completely in shock when I realized we'd lost one of my favourite American actors, John Ritter.  I was a sap, I bawled my eyes out.  I simply loved his films, he will be forever missed.

Everyone probably thought I dissappeared off the face of the planet.  I swear, it was Tom! *cries* he locked me in his closet!  Oh the horror, and it was smelly too *sniff* 

Hahahha ;) I've got a bloody headache, my bum hurts and I need something to eat because I am hungry.  I'll be back sometime later, I s'pose.  I love all of ya, I miss all of ya.  That wasn't really a real update, but still, it's an update.

If I dissappear for a long while again, and I get clones, please like....ummm, scare them away?  Yeah, I know Dan and Tom are good at that ;)

Oi, i am back! I'm so sorry chaps, that I couldn't be here for a while.  Filming has really taken up most of my time. 

<lj-cut text="real explanation">

[my computer at home has finally died.  the lightening storm has killed it and i have no computer, so i have to find my way to the internet, which i did today, i'm at my grandmother's house. 

the wedding was great, i didn't cry, nor did i fall and trip down the aisle (which i thought i was going to do) as you can see, i survived.  hopefully i'll find some way to bring emma back online.  at least i'm updating her again, no?]

</lj-cut>

So, I might be online sometime tonight, bonnie i'm sorry i havent been there for you lately, i just got your comment.  livejournal has really changed so i'm trying to figure everything out, i'm bloody confused.  

well i'm back, i missed all of you!



-emma

Oi, went to the store and bought Rupert a bit of something. Here's what I got him: Scabbers plush toy, a Ron Weasley figurine, and a Hermione Granger figure Well it's raining here in Oxford, hope it's not where Rupert is....and it's lightening bad so I gotta go before I get zapped! [going to my older sister's wedding in New York on Tuesday. Won't be back until Sunday. You can call it a bit of a vacation, but I have to be a bridesmaid urfff....so anyways, I won't be able to update Emma probably until next Sunday. ]

I have a new layout.  Go check it out, I'm proud of myself.  My little flying Harry's are back from the dead.  Yay.  I can't say I'm too proud of my journal picture, but I tried. 

Well, I best be off, more of a bigger update later, I have to figure out what to wear to my boyfriend's birthday party.
A Big Happy Birthday goes to my boyfriend <lj user="rupert__grint"> I love you baby you will get your present later :-*

My LiveJournal Sitcom
Bringing Up emma___watson (TNN, 8:30): emma___watson (Robert Patrick) can't find caitlin_m (Jim Carrey)'s coat and pretends it was never missing. The next day, k_russell (Nikki Cox) misinterprets an email from bif_naked (Zachery Ty Bryan) and tries to get into a bodega for free. Upstairs, laura_bush (Chris Farley) hires rupert__grint (Keanu Reeves) to perform pantomime at a homeless shelter. Later that day, hillyduff (Gary Cole) makes fun of furtado (Tom Waits) for enjoying Marxism. The week after, welcome_wagon (River Phoenix) bakes 500 cookies for a bake sale, but dry_jeff_cell (Toole, Peter ) eats them all. TV-G.
What's Your LiveJournal Sitcom? (by rfreebern)
How does everybody get that nifty style like Jamie and Deb have? I want one like it *sob*

Eww, I haven't updated in a while, bad Emma. 

Rupert came camping last weeked.  It was fun.  All we did was sit under the stars and stare up at the sky, talking to eachother.  I swear that's all we did =P don't belive Tom if he says he's got a tape, because he bloody doesn't.  =P

So, we had fun, roasting marshmellows by the fire, and Rupert and my brother Alex went fishing.  Mum really enjoyed him there.  Rupert's great fun, as always. 

Well, I better be going.  My next task is to hire someone to go and steal Jamie-Lynn and bring her to London.  How much do you think I should ask for a randsom?

I just bought another paid account, yay.  With my own money :D

So anyways, I feel sorry for those Americans with no electricity.  It should be turned on by now isn't it?  I haven't been watching the telly for the news lately but I saw it last night.  They say it's the biggest Blackout since like the sixties or something.  Good thing I'm in good ol' London where we have lights :D I know that was mean but I couldn't help it :-* I love all you New Yorkers though, good city, visited it myself while being on TRL with Rup.  


Well, I gotta go, I love my husband, my boyfriend, and my wifey :-*
